content.html: Not the best season—but still, it was a year with Modrić. For as long as he played for us, that was more than enough for me.

I've been dreading this day for a while, but now the goodbye is real, and I'm just... incredibly sad—and a bit existential, even. I'm sure Saturday is going to be special for him and Ancelotti, but if the Club World Cup somehow entered a time vortex where the games constantly loop and never end... well, I wouldn't complain.
